SET ARQUIVO_TREINADORES TO '91230842311;Nanis;202411191430;000000000000;0000002000.00;######################################42714376303;BrumKs;202411191450;000000000000;0000000010.00;#####################################65037521605;TheGhost;202411200230;000000000000;0000000000.00;###################################93804621236;Maximus;202411200400;000000000000;0000000000.00;####################################59932519774;MaximusJr;202411200130;000000000000;0000000000.00;##################################91004621999;LorenGC;202411191430;000000000000;0000004010.00;####################################51004621955;Wallksss;202411190730;000000000000;0000003905.00;###################################72849561234;Bagi;202411190430;000000000000;0000000800.00;#######################################83920491234;Swayy;202411200137;000000000000;0000000500.20;######################################91230562845;Tony;202411200245;000000000000;0000000330.00;#######################################83920564723;Nino;202411192142;000000000000;0000002050.00;#######################################72839562301;Snarfx;202411191737;000000000000;0000000099.99;#####################################';
SET ARQUIVO_BOLSOMONS TO '000;Bolsosaur;Ataque de vinhas;0000000600.00;#######################################################001;Lagarteza;Camuflar;0000000150.50;###############################################################002;Pescachu;Choque do trovao;0000000800.00;########################################################';
SET ARQUIVO_TREINADOR_POSSUI_BOLSOMON TO '9123084231100142714376303000427143763030016503752160500193804621236001599325197740019100462199900151004621955001510046219550007284956123400183920491234001912305628450018392056472300172839562301000';
INSERT INTO batalhas VALUES ('202411201830', '022010', '0004', '427143763039123084231193804621236599325127759100462199951004621955728495612348392049123491230562845839205647237283956230165037521605', '001001001001001001001001001001000001', '022010021005020109015515014210013252012417011442010522005414004244003122', '000500030001000000000000000000000000000000000000', '111122223333444455556666777788889999000011112222');
INSERT INTO batalhas VALUES ('202411142120', '004012', '0001', '912308423114271437630365037521605938046212365993251977491004621999510046219557284956123483920491234912305628458392056472372839562301', '001000001001001001001001001001001001', '004012003522003210003053002738002322002209001954001742001010000420000205', '001100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000', '333344445555666677778888999900001111222233334444');
INSERT INTO batalhas VALUES ('202411142120', '004112', '0008', '912308423114271437630365037521605938046212365993251977491004621999510046219557284956123483920491234912305628458392056472372839562301', '001000001001001001001001001001001000', '004012003522003210003053002738002322002209001954001742001010000420000205', '001100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000', '555566667777888899990000111122223333444455556666');
INSERT INTO batalhas VALUES ('202411142120', '004528', '0074', '427143763039123084231193804621236599325197749100462199951004621955728495612348392049123491230562845839205647237283956230165037521605', '001001001001001001001001001001000001', '022010021005020109015515014210013252012417011442010522005414004244003122', '000500030001000000000000000000000000000000000000', '777788889999000011112222333344445555666677778888');
SELECT * FROM bolsomons WHERE preco_bolsobolas <= ('SELECT bolsobolas FROM treinadores WHERE id_treinador = '91230842311' ');
SELECT * FROM batalhas WHERE id_batalha = '00000001';
DELETE FROM treinadores WHERE id_treinador = '91230842311';
DELETE FROM treinadores WHERE id_treinador = '59932519774';
UPDATE treinadores SET bolsobolas = bolsobolas + '185.21' WHERE id_treinador = '91230842311';
echo file ARQUIVO_TREINADORES
echo file ARQUIVO_BOLSOMONS
echo file ARQUIVO_BATALHAS
echo file ARQUIVO_TREINADOR_POSSUI_BOLSOMON
echo file ARQUIVO_RESULTADOS
echo index treinadores_idx
echo index bolsomons_idx
echo index preco_bolsomon_idx
echo index batalhas_idx
echo index treinador_possui_bolsomon_idx
echo index resultados_idx
VACUUM treinadores;
echo file ARQUIVO_TREINADORES
q
